(19) a. Oposo kema pitxi unawa muna txa.
Then tapir penis they bring AUX

Then tapir penis they bring AUX
Oposo kema pitxi unawa muna txa.
Then tapir penis they bring AUX
Then they brought the tapir's penis.
The girl would go eating fruit.
Mipake taught his language to you.
